channel.title: Does anyone know the scripting for item dropping (like a drop party)
channel.description: need help writing the script for a drop party command as in dropping items on the floor through the command

item.title: Does anyone know the scripting for item dropping (like a drop party)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

What are the logical steps that are needed to accomplish this? From those, keep breaking it down into it’s simplest form, and then you’ll have a pretty good pseudo-code start.

Read full topic
